title: UPDATES PERMITTED AFTER APPLICATION IS DENIED
content:
Ord. No. 20230831-142, Pt. 31, effective September 1, 2023, repealed the former ยง 30-2-102, and enacted
a new ยง 30-2-102 as set out herein. The former ยง 30-2-102 pertained to expiration
of subdivision construction and derived from City Code Section 25-4-102; Ord. 031211-11;
Ord. 031211-42.

(A)

Construction management for a subdivision is governed by Chapter 30-1, Article 10 (Subdivision Construction).

(B)

Issuance of a certificate of compliance for a subdivision is governed by Chapter 30-1, Article 11 (Certificates Of Compliance).

Source: City Code Section 25-4-103; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.
